name: Lonely Planet Volunteer Traveller's Guide 4th Edition
description: Do you want to make a difference and help the communities you visit? By volunteering abroad, you can build skills, gain new knowledge, and expand your perspective while helping other people. This guide will help you plan your volunteer experience anywhere in the world.

Author: Charlotte Hindle, Nate Cavalieri, Rachel Collinson, Korina Miller, Mike Richard, Sarah Wintle
